Text:
Seems to be a dam good ripper.
The crackprogg works in XP good, but not find the file in W7 and buggy so you can only ripp, not convert because then the program ask for registration.

Forgot to say, I got XP-32 bit and W7-64 bit, so maybe it is at bit-problem.
The patch better be re-written/fixed.

XP-32 = OK
W7-64= Rip OK, not convert.
